questions.question: 1. The type of heat transfer process, occurs between a solid surface and a fluid exposed to it is ________

2. The closed loop transfer function for a second order system is:

Calculate the settling time for a 2 percent and 5 percent band.
3. If it was possible for a proportional controller to have a true zero percent proportional band, the controller gain would have to be ____
4. The low-pass filter is also known as a _____
5. The frequency at which maximum amplitude ratio is attained is called the __________ frequency.
6. Which one of the following statements is true ?

answers.a: PD controller is a high-pass filter
answers.b: PD controller is a low-pass filter
answers.c: PD controller is a notch filter
answers.d: PD controller is a band-pass filter

questions.question: 7. The two key variables in a thermal process are ______ .

answers.a: Temperature T and heat stored Q
answers.b: Temperature T and thermal resistance R
answers.c: Thermal resistance R and thermal capacitance C

questions.question: 8. The nozzleâ€“flapper amplifier converts  ______  into a pressure signal.
9. In case of PID controller which of the following statements is true ?

answers.a: PI control action occurs at the low-frequency region
answers.b: PI control action occurs at the high-frequency region
answers.c: PD control action occurs at the low-frequency region

questions.question: 10. The PD controller is a simplified version of the ______.
